Hi bligbluesea,

 First up, thank you so much for these amazing uploads. Great work and great spirit of sharing.

 As you seem to like the challenge of finding "impossible to find books", could you check if the following are in your treasure chest?

 Juggernaut by Adam Baker
 The Diary of Ma Yan by Ma Yan and Pierre Haski 
 The Secret Life of Bees by Sue Monk Kidd
 and
 The Middle Kingdom series by David Wingrove

 eternal thanks

Just wanted to post a big THANK YOU for these torrents! Found a lot of good books!

Can I make a request or two? I'd love to have an epub copy of 'Mr. Spaceman' by Robert Olen Butler, and 'Locked in Time' by Lois Duncan. 

I definitely recommend Mr. Spaceman to everyone! It's a hilarious, heartwarming and bittersweet book. 

Thanks again!

@Ianp

Yesterday I started to to put all the ePUBS I've uploaded, by flood ,into a Pdf file that I will include with every flood and update every time I upload another flood.I have been getting  a lot of requests for books I've already uploaded,I know it's a hassle to go through every flood so hopefully this will make it easier .

I do have the two books you want,I will upload them in flood #27


Thank you for your comment,I appreciate it :)
